item.description: Whether you are a new mother or seasoned mom, this discussion is for you! How many times have we, as mothers, said, “If I knew then what I know now…” No matter how much good (or otherwise) advice we get, we are still wiser for the time we’ve spent being a mother. What was some of the advice you got as a new mother? What are some of your biggest motherhood revelations? What advice do you have to share? Join us for a rousing chat-in-the-hat about your mothering wisdom.
item.name: Discussion: "If I knew then..."
